alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:56PM CDT until June 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Caldwell County in south central Texas... Southeastern Bastrop County in south central Texas... Southwestern Fayette County in south central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithville, Cistern, Rosanky, Muldoon, Upton, Hills Prairie, Togo, String Prairie, Alum Creek, Floy, Buescher State Park, Kovar, Jeddo, Colony, Elm Grove and Delhi. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
